title: Doctors Portal
description: Doctors Portal is a responsive website for scheduling doctor appointments. Users must log in to book, view, or manage their schedules. The dashboard displays all appointments, and users can delete their schedules if needed.

title: Stunning Portfolio
description: This is a React-based portfolio project styled with Vanilla CSS. It features a clean and responsive design. It includes sections for skills, projects, and contact forms, providing a structured showcase of work and expertise.

title: Survey Bee
description: Survey Bee is an online survey platform that allows users to create, distribute, and analyze surveys. It features an intuitive UI for designing questionnaires, collecting responses, and helps data-driven decision-making.

title: SkyPearl News
description: SkyPearl News is an online news platform that provides the latest updates across various categories. Users can log in via Google or GitHub, explore trending stories, and engage with content through social sharing features.
